p: Five mosquito sentinel sites in five different villages of Vientiane Capital were chosen for the mosquito surveillance and the GPS locations are presented in Table 4. The vectors abundance study took place during both dry and rainy seasons between 2016 and 2019. BG sentinel traps Â® (Biogents, Regensburg, Germany) were used to follow the dynamics of mosquito population abundance in the city (4 traps per locations, except at Kao-Gnot with two traps). After every weekly collection, the adult mosquitoes were brought back to the laboratory for morphological identification.
